subject: UEFA Champions League (Soccer)
Soccer
lead_paragraph: Manchester City needed a late goal by Yaya Toure for a 1-1 tie at Stoke that put rival Manchester United in position to open a 3-point lead in the Premier League.
snippet: Manchester City needed a late goal by Yaya Toure for a 1-1 tie at Stoke that put rival Manchester United in position to open a 3-point lead in the Premier League.
